title: Apples
description: A round fruit with a firm outer skin that can be red, green, or yellow and a crisp, juicy interior.

title: Bananas
description: A popular fruit known for their high potassium content, sweet taste, and distinctive yellow color.

title: Mango
description: Mangoes are a sweet and juicy tropical fruit with a unique flavor and texture that are often enjoyed fresh, blended into smoothies or used in various culinary dishes.

title: Orange
description: Oranges are a citrus fruit with a juicy flesh and a tangy, sweet flavor, packed with vitamin C and other beneficial nutrients.

title: Pineapple
description: Pineapples are a tropical fruit with a tough, spiky exterior and sweet, juicy yellow flesh inside.

title: Watermelon
description: Watermelons are a juicy and refreshing fruit that is known for its sweet taste and high water content.
